name: Operation Penguin Rescue
description:
Operation Penguin Rescue is a bite-sized (15-min) game all about rescuing cute penguins from a dangerous avalanche. 

You play as Orange, a polar research explorer tasked with saving the penguins alongside your trusty partner Red.

Use W and S (or the arrow keys) to move Orange up and down to collect each penguin as it slides towards you

When you're ready, click to launch the penguin into the collection crate located on the back of Red's snow mobile. 

Orange can only store up to 5 penguins, so you'll need to launch often. And make sure to avoid launching penguins into other penguins as they slide down the mountain!

  • Arcade-style side-scrolling action
  • Multiple cute penguin types to collect
  • Moving obstacles and bouncing snow mobiles
  • Medals for 100% completion on each level
  • Responsive character animations
  • Hand-drawn art
  • 4 Levels with unique terrain
